about_the_game:
Save The Village is a captivating medieval tower defense game that puts you in the role of a village protector. Each village you defend is under siege by waves of skeleton warriors, goblins, and powerful bosses. You must build, upgrade, and strategically position towers, and use magic to stop the enemies in their tracks.

Travel through unique villages, each with its own atmosphere, challenges, and geography. From the tranquil hills of Startville to the fiery depths of Inferno Hollow, every level brings new enemies, bosses, and tactical challenges. Will you be able to defend the villages and stop the dark forces threatening the kingdom?

Features:

  • Defend against waves of skeletons, goblins, and powerful bosses

  • Build and upgrade towers with unique abilities and strengths

  • Explore beautifully designed villages, each with its own challenges

  • Unlock powerful magic and skills to dominate the battlefield

  • Experience challenging gameplay with deep strategy and tactical elements

  • Single-player campaign, built for PC

Take control, plan your defenses, and protect the villagers in this epic medieval adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur 11.5.2 or newer, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel & Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur 11.5.2 or newer, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 Core GPU or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

name: Save The Village - Tower Defense Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Tower Defense, Medieval Strategy, Indie Game, Village Defense, Tactical Gameplay, Defense Towers, Waves of Enemies, Fantasy Villages
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11, 64-bit versions
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT1030 or AMD RX550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: Save The Village is a medieval tower defense game where you strategically protect villages from waves of skeletons, goblins, and fearsome bosses. Build powerful towers and use magical abilities to fend off the invading forces!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
